commit.message:
PR c++/5116, c++/764 reversion

cp:
	PR c++/5116, c++/764 reversion
	* call.c (build_new_op): Revert the instantiations. They are
	incorrect.
testsuite:
	* g++.dg/template/friend2.C: Remove as patch is reverted.

From-SVN: r48474

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@

+	incorrect.

 2002-01-02  Nathan Sidwell  <nathan@codesourcery.com>
 
 	PR c++/5089
